Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
com.gamestore.model.SalableProduct
com.gamestore.model.Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<SalableProduct>
public class Weapon extends SalableProduct
Represents a weapon that can be sold in the game store. Extends the SalableProduct class with weapon-specific attributes such as damage, rate of fire, and effective range. Weapons are specialized items that players can use for combat in the game world.

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon()
      Default constructor required for JSON deserialization. Creates an empty weapon with no initialized values.

    • Weapon

      public Weapon(String name, String description, double price, int quantity, int damage)
      Constructs a new Weapon with basic attributes. This constructor is used when rate of fire and range are not specified.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the weapon
      description - The description of the weapon
      price - The price of the weapon in dollars
      quantity - The quantity available in inventory
      damage - The damage value of the weapon

    • Weapon

      public Weapon(String name, String description, double price, int quantity, int damage, int rateOfFire, int range)
      Constructs a new Weapon with all attributes. This is the most complete constructor that initializes all weapon properties.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the weapon
      description - The description of the weapon
      price - The price of the weapon in dollars
      quantity - The quantity available in inventory
      damage - The damage value of the weapon
      rateOfFire - The rate of fire (rounds per minute)
      range - The effective range in meters

  • Method Details

    • getDamage

      public int getDamage()
      Gets the damage value of the weapon. Higher damage values indicate more powerful weapons.
      Returns:
      The damage value

    • setDamage

      public void setDamage(int damage)
      Sets the damage value of the weapon.
      Parameters:
      damage - The damage value to set (should be positive)

    • getRateOfFire

      public int getRateOfFire()
      Gets the rate of fire of the weapon. This represents how quickly the weapon can be fired.
      Returns:
      The rate of fire in rounds per minute

    • setRateOfFire

      public void setRateOfFire(int rateOfFire)
      Sets the rate of fire of the weapon.
      Parameters:
      rateOfFire - The rate of fire to set in rounds per minute

    • getRange

      public int getRange()
      Gets the effective range of the weapon. This represents the maximum distance at which the weapon remains effective.
      Returns:
      The range in meters

    • setRange

      public void setRange(int range)
      Sets the effective range of the weapon.
      Parameters:
      range - The range to set in meters

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the weapon. Extends the parent class toString() method by adding weapon-specific attributes.
      Overrides:
      toString in class SalableProduct
      Returns:
      A formatted string with weapon details including damage, rate of fire, and range
